name: The 37th Week
description: A real-time VR FILM experience designed for VR, The 37th Week will let you take the place of a fetus, hours before birth. You will immerse in the magnificence of the womb and follow the dialogues that take place outside.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel i5 4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 Sound Card: Any
